input_email_body:
Subject: -Assistance Needed with Investment Recommendations Issue-

Respected Customer Support Team,

I am contacting you to address a problem I've encountered with the investment advice generated by the data analysis software. There seems to be an error with the suggestions provided, and I suspect the system might be malfunctioning.

I have already attempted to resolve the issue by restarting the system, reviewing the data sources and confirming the input details My name is John Doe.. Despite these actions, the issue remains unresolved.

I kindly request that you investigate the matter and provide a prompt solution. If there are any extra steps I can take to help resolve this or if you require more details, please inform me.

Thank you for your support.

Best regards,
[Your Name] You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.
